articles.author: Harry Robertson, Stella Qiu
articles.title: Asian shares mostly higher, yen hits record low versus euro - Reuters.com
articles.description: European stocks fell on Tuesday after a 7% drop in chipmaker Nvidia dragged down U.S. tech companies on Monday, in a sign of nervousness about the artificial intelligence boom.

articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Apple shelved the idea of integrating Meta's AI models over privacy concerns, report says - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple held talks with Meta to integrate its models a few months ago, but decided against the idea over privacy concerns.
articles.content:
Days after the Wall Street Journal reported that Apple and Meta were in talks to integrate the latter’s AI models, Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman said that the iPhone maker was not planning any such move.

articles.title: OpenAI buys a remote collaboration platform - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI is buying a video-focused remote collaboration platform, Multi, for an undisclosed amount.
articles.content:
OpenAI is on an M&A tear.

articles.content: Research reveals that melamine sponges, commonly used for cleaning, release over a trillion microplastic fibers globally each month due to wear and tear. These fibers can contaminate water systems an… [+3315 chars]
